mos def: it was 1996 4th of july looking off in the sky dealing with thoughts inside when something caught my eye it was a silhouette of a beautiful woman bright with life carrying my first seed looking like she gone bear fruit tonight we at the african street festival and she walking around talking about the midwife said that bring the baby down im about to be a father the sights and sounds seem brighter around me and for starters i know imma work harder word we got home at three in the morning i was beat them contractions started coming as soon as i fell asleep 3:05 like every five minutes then the water broke we aught to go yelling at the cabbie cause hes sort of slow you know them hospitals all trying to get paid no questions here come the doctors with they drugs trying to do c-sections but my baby stays strong in labor for yay long eight-pound baby boy to carry my name on joy
